languages.text: "Мы оба изрядно утомимся раньше, чем я завершу перечисление ваших прегрешений. Вы здесь не для того, чтобы экзаменовать мою осведомленность, так что давайте просто сойдемся, что на свой приговор вы уже наработали. Я доступно изложил свою мысль?"

"We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"
languages.original_text: "Мы оба изрядно утомимся раньше, чем я завершу перечисление ваших прегрешений. Вы здесь не для того, чтобы экзаменовать мою осведомленность, так что давайте просто сойдемся, что на свой приговор вы уже наработали. Я доступно изложил свою мысль?"

traits.locale_text: "We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

"We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

"We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

"We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

languages.text: “如果你要我把你所有的罪行都列出来，那恐怕等不到我说完，我们两个就都会累垮了。既然你不是来考验我的知识的，那我们可以一致认为你罪有应得。我说得还不够明确吗？你应该能听得懂吧？”
languages.original_text: "We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你要我把你所有的罪行都列出来，那恐怕等不到我说完，我们两个就都会累垮了。既然你不是来考验我的知识的，那我们可以一致认为你罪有应得。我说得还不够明确吗？你应该能听得懂吧？”

languages.text: «Acabaremos agotados antes de que recite la lista completa de sus transgresiones. No está aquí para poner a prueba mis conocimientos, así que limitémonos a acordar que se ha ganado la sentencia con creces. ¿Me he expresado con suficiente claridad para que lo entienda?».
languages.original_text: "We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

traits.locale_text: «Acabaremos agotados antes de que recite la lista completa de sus transgresiones. No está aquí para poner a prueba mis conocimientos, así que limitémonos a acordar que se ha ganado la sentencia con creces. ¿Me he expresado con suficiente claridad para que lo entienda?».

languages.text: 「お前の罪をすべて挙げていては、お互い疲弊してしまう。ここは私の情報網を試す場ではない。すでに宣告したよりもっと多くの事項に同意してもらう。お前にも分かるような平易な言葉ではっきりと言ってやっただろう？」
languages.original_text: "We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の罪をすべて挙げていては、お互い疲弊してしまう。ここは私の情報網を試す場ではない。すでに宣告したよりもっと多くの事項に同意してもらう。お前にも分かるような平易な言葉ではっきりと言ってやっただろう？」

languages.text: « La liste de vos offenses est si longue que nous risquons de tomber de sommeil avant que je n'arrive au bout. Vous n'êtes pas là pour mettre mes connaissances à l'épreuve, alors convenons simplement que vous avez déjà largement mérité votre sentence. Les mots que je viens d'employer sont-ils suffisamment simples pour que vous les compreniez ? »
languages.original_text: "We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"

traits.locale_text: « La liste de vos offenses est si longue que nous risquons de tomber de sommeil avant que je n'arrive au bout. Vous n'êtes pas là pour mettre mes connaissances à l'épreuve, alors convenons simplement que vous avez déjà largement mérité votre sentence. Les mots que je viens d'employer sont-ils suffisamment simples pour que vous les compreniez ? »

languages.text: "Wir wären beide erschöpft, bevor ich mit der Verlesung der Liste Eurer Verfehlungen fertig wäre. Es geht hier nicht darum, wie gut ich informiert bin, also lasst uns übereinkommen, dass Ihr Eure Strafe mehr als verdient habt. Habe ich mich simpel genug ausgedrückt, sodass Ihr mich verstehen konntet?"
languages.original_text: "We will both tire before I finish reciting the list of all your transgressions. You are not here to test my knowledge, so let us just agree that you have already more than earned your sentence. Have I expressed myself in terms basic enough for you to understand?"
